title: New: Little Children – Distant Shouts
content:
After being seriously impressed upon my first listen to Little Children a few weeks back, the release of new track Distant Shouts is very welcome indeed. Fresh from supporting fellow countrymen Shout Out Louds on their U.S tour and plying his trade in Austin at SXSW, Stockholm resident Linus Lutti let us hear his project’s new song online at the end of last week.

Apparently the track was recorded for American hospital drama Grey’s Anatomy, which might explain the slight step-up in production value – I have no idea what kind-of scene it’s been used in (one can probably rule out anything too uplifting), but thankfully there’s been no compromise on quality. It’s another confident display of Lutti’s thoughtful and emotive songwriting – rather than any TV show association, it should just go further in marking Little Children as a band to watch out for. Listen via soundcloud below:

https://soundcloud.com/little-children/distant-shouts
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d1a
